relations.target: shot: an informal photograph; usually made with a small hand-held camera; 'my snapshots haven't been developed yet'; 'he tried to get unposed shots of his friends' <i59132>
screen: the display that is electronically created on the surface of the large end of a cathode-ray tube <i58557>
record: make a record of; set down in permanent form <i26586>

senses.definition: to capture an image from a computer's display
